name: Seven Winds Studio
tagline: Mobile apps, games, VR/AR projects developer
description:
We offer full range of the services in the field of program development: mobile apps, games and VR/AR projects. We build software, maintain documentation, create interface design, graphic design and animation, as well as carry out testing and publish products in the Apple AppStore and the Google Play Market.
Our company was founded in 2013. Nowadays we cover the market of Russia, Europe and the United States. Our staff includes all the necessary specialists (Android, iOS, Unity, Xamarin, Drupal, PHP), designers and animators, testers and other experts (project and game designers). Owing to our modern equipment we are able to release excellent software products which have passed the full cycle of testing and debugging.
